mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_PHONE, CREATED_DATE, DELETED_DATE) VALUES (#{memberDTO.userId}, #{memberDTO.userPwd}, #{memberDTO.userName}, #{memberDTO.userPhone}, #{memberDTO.createdDate}, #{memberDTO.deletedDate})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
